thread.subject: Diwali Discount Offer for Partners
thread.body:
Dear Hotel Serenity Team,

We are pleased to offer you a partnership opportunity for our Diwali Discount Offer campaign. We've attached a detailed proposal outlining the rates and benefits.  Please let us know if you are interested in participating.

Sincerely,
Your Email Reply Team

thread.subject: Re: Diwali Discount Offer for Partners
thread.body: Thank you for your email.  While we appreciate the offer, the proposed rates are significantly lower than our usual Diwali pricing.  We are not able to offer rooms at these rates during this peak season.

thread.subject: Re: Diwali Discount Offer for Partners
thread.body: Thank you for your prompt response. We understand that Diwali is a peak season. Could you please let us know what rate you would consider for a partnership? We are flexible and willing to discuss different options to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

thread.subject: Re: Diwali Discount Offer for Partners
thread.body: We would need to see a rate increase of at least 15% on your proposed rates to consider this partnership.

thread.subject: Re: Diwali Discount Offer for Partners
thread.body: We can offer a 10% increase on our initial proposal. This would still provide significant value for your hotel and a strong boost in bookings during the Diwali season.  Would this be acceptable?

thread.subject: Re: Diwali Discount Offer for Partners
thread.body: Let's meet halfway. We can accept a 12.5% increase on your initial proposal.  This is our final offer.

thread.subject: Re: Diwali Discount Offer for Partners
thread.body: Agreed! We accept your counter-offer. Please let us know the next steps to formalize this partnership.
